FarmBlockV2_wheet.description:
A farm that can grow Wheat.
It requires an average amount of time to harvest.
Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest crops.

FarmBlockV2_tomato.description:
A farm that can grow Tomato.
They take time to harvest, but increase the variety of meals you can prepare.
Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

FarmBlockV2_Lettuce.description:
A farm that can grow Lettuce.
It takes time to harvest, but increases the variety of meals you can prepare.
Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

FarmBlockV2_Berries.description:
A farm that can grow Red Berries.
Harvest time is quick, but eating them doesn't provide much sustenance.
Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

PalFoodBox.description:
A box for storing Pal food.
Pals can feed from it when hungry.
Make sure to keep it well-stocked to keep your Pals happy.

Wooden_foundation.description:
A foundation for building walls or facilities on.
Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Wooden_wall.description:
Walls built on foundations for keeping out intruders.
Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Wood_WindowWall.description:
Wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders. Includes a window.
Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Wood_TriangleWall.description:
Triangular wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders.
Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Wooden_roof.description:
A roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind.
Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Wood_SlantedRoof.description:
Slanted roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind.
Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Wooden_stair.description:
Stairs placed below a foundation or roof for climbing up.
Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Wooden_DoorWall.description:
Door built on a foundation. Becomes an entrance.
Made from wood, it breaks easily.

DefenseWall_Wood.description:
Massive defensive wall to prevent enemy intrusions.
Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Wood_Gate.description:
Gate large enough for big Pals to pass through.
Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Stone_foundation.description:
A foundation for building walls or facilities on.
Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stone_wall.description:
Walls built on foundations for keeping out intruders.
Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stone_WindowWall.description:
Wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders. Includes a window.
Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stone_TriangleWall.description:
Triangular wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders.
Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stone_roof.description:
A roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind.
Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stone_SlantedRoof.description:
Slanted roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind.
Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stone_stair.description:
Stairs placed below a foundation or roof for climbing up.
Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stone_DoorWall.description:
Door built on a foundation. Becomes an entrance.
Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

DefenseWall.description:
Massive defensive wall to prevent enemy intrusions.
Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stone_Gate.description:
Gate large enough for big Pals to pass through.
Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Metal_foundation.description:
A foundation for building walls or facilities on.
Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

Metal_wall.description:
Walls built on foundations for keeping out intruders.
Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

Metal_WindowWall.description:
Wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders. Includes a window.
Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

Metal_TriangleWall.description:
Triangular wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders.
Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

Metal_roof.description:
A roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind.
Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

Metal_SlantedRoof.description:
Slanted roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind.
Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

Metal_stair.description:
Stairs placed below a foundation or roof for climbing up.
Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

Metal_DoorWall.description:
Door built on a foundation. Becomes an entrance.
Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

DefenseWall_Metal.description:
Massive defensive wall to prevent enemy intrusions.
Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

Metal_Gate.description:
Gate large enough for big Pals to pass through.
Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

DefenseBowGun.description:
Deploy a Pal to operate this defensive installation.
Requires Arrow to use.
Place ammo in the chest, and the deployed Pal will automatically load the weapon.

DefenseMachinegun.description:
Deploy a Pal to operate this defensive installation.
Requires Rifle Ammo to use.
Place ammo in the chest, and the deployed Pal will automatically load the weapon.

DefenseMissile.description:
Deploy a Pal to operate this defensive installation.
Requires Rocket Ammo to use.
Place ammo in the chest, and the deployed Pal will automatically load the weapon.

DefenseWait.description:
Defensive installation to protect a base from enemies.
Place a Pal and it will ignore other work
to stay on lookout and prepare for combat.

ElectricGenerator.description:
A power generator fueled by Electric Pals.
Electric equipment won't run without this.

FastTravelPoint.description:
A stone monument in the shape of a <characterName id=|ChickenPal|/>.
Allows fast travel to the location where it is placed.

ItemChest.description:
Stores items.
Made from wood, it breaks easily.
It's probably not the best thing to store valuables in.

ItemChest_02.description:
Stores items.
Reinforced with metal, it is somewhat durable.
The increased size allows for the storage of more things.

ItemChest_03.description:
Stores items.
Made of iron, it is extremely durable.
It is useful as a large, secure storage box.

PlayerBed_02.description:
A shoddy bed for humans.
Use it when injured or to sleep at night.
You won't be able to sleep soundly without a roof over your head.

PlayerBed_03.description:
A fluffy bed for humans.
Use it when injured or to sleep at night.
You won't be able to sleep soundly without a roof over your head.

BuildableGoddessStatue.description:
Stone statue spoken of in legends on Palpagos Island.
Offer up Lifmunk Effigy to receive strange powers.

Heater.description:
A device that blows warm air, raising the temperature of a base.
It doesn't provide much warmth, but helps one to endure somewhat cold environments.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

ElectricHeater.description:
A device that blows warm air, raising the temperature of a base.
Using electricity, it can really heat things up.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

Cooler.description:
A device that blows cool air, lowering the temperature of a base.
It doesn't provide much relief from the heat, but helps one to endure somewhat hot environments.
Requires an Ice Pal for cooling.

ElectricCooler.description:
A device that blows cool air, lowering the temperature of a base.
Using electricity, it can really lower the temperature.
Requires an Ice Pal for cooling.

Torch.description:
A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

WallTorch.description:
A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night.
It can be placed on walls.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

Lamp.description:
A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night.
Requires electricity, but lights up a larger area.

CeilingLamp.description:
A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night.
It can be placed on a ceiling.
Requires electricity, but lights up a larger area.

LargeLamp.description:
A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night.
Requires a significant amount of electricity, but lights up an even larger area.

LargeCeilingLamp.description:
A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night.
It can be placed on a ceiling.
Requires a significant amount of electricity, but lights up an even larger area.

Trap_LegHold.description: Trap that immobilizes Pals who step on it. The capture rate with the sphere increases when a Pal is trapped. Only effective on small Pals.

Trap_LegHold_Big.description: A bear trap to immobilize large Pals. The capture rate with the sphere increases when a Pal is trapped. Only effective on large Pals, small Pals will not be caught.

Trap_Noose.description:
Trap that catches Pals passing through it.
Pals caught in the trap are easier to catch with Spheres.
Only effective on small Pals.

Trap_MovingPanel.description: A description of the moving panel

Trap_MineElecShock.description: Trap that electrocutes the Pal that steps on it. The electrocuted Pal has a higher capture rate with the sphere.

Trap_MineFreeze.description: Trap that freezes the Pal that steps on it. The frozen Pal has a higher capture rate with the sphere.

Trap_MineAttack.description: Trap that explodes when a Pal steps on it. It deals damage to a wide area.

MedicalPalBed_02.description:
A straw bed for Pals.
Pals can rest on it when injured, or to sleep at night.
It isn't soft, but it's better than nothing.

MedicalPalBed_03.description:
A fluffy bed that Pals can get a good rest on.
Pals can rest on it when injured, or to sleep at night.
Pals love sleeping on fluffy beds like this.

MedicalPalBed_04.description:
Fluffy bed to give Pals a good rest.
Pals can rest when injured or sleep at night.
Even large Pals can sleep soundly on a bed like this.

PalBoxV2.description:
Facility for storing captured Pals.
Pals inside gradually recover Health.
Area around this facility becomes a base.

DisplayCharacter.description:
Container for observing captured Pals.
Pals inside cannot participate in battle or production,
but they do not become hungry.

CharacterRankUp.description:
A chamber for increasing a Pal's rank.
Pals can surpass their physical limitations if given
a concentrated extract taken from a Pal of the same type.

SphereFactory_Black_01.description:
An Assembly Line for producing spheres used for capturing Pals.
A small workspace keeps the production speed slow.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

SphereFactory_Black_02.description:
An Assembly Line for producing spheres used for capturing Pals.
By splitting Pals into groups, production speeds have somewhat increased.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

SphereFactory_Black_03.description:
An Assembly Line for producing spheres used for capturing Pals.
Through clever management, production speeds have greatly increased.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

HatchingPalEgg.description:
Used for incubating a Pal Egg.
If a Pal Egg is left in it, it will automatically hatch after some time has passed.

ElectricHatchingPalEgg.description:
Device for incubating Pal eggs.
Requires electricity, but automatically keeps the
inside of the incubator at appropriate temperatures.

Spa.description:
Facility where Pals on base can rest.
Restores SAN after a long day of hard work.

Spa2.description:
Facility where Pals on base can rest.
Now comfier and restores more SAN.

BlastFurnace.description:
Allows refinement of Ingot.
The quality leaves much to desire, and processing is slow.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

BlastFurnace2.description:
Allows refinement of Refined Ingot.
The quality has improved, but the processing speed is still unsatisfactory.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

BlastFurnace3.description:
Allows refinement of Pal Metal Ingot.
It requires electricity to use, but is quicker to process.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

CampFire.description:
Needed for cooking food.
It can only be used to grill simple ingredients.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

CookingStove.description:
Needed for cooking food.
Use of a cooking pot allows for a wider variety of meal preparation.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

ElectricKitchen.description:
Needed for cooking food.
It requires electricity to run, but allows a large amount of meals to be prepared rapidly.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

Factory_Hard_01.description:
A High Quality Workbench for producing items and gear.
A small workspace limits production speeds.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

Factory_Hard_02.description:
A High Quality Workbench for producing items and gear.
By splitting Pals into groups, production speeds have somewhat increased.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

Factory_Hard_03.description:
A High Quality Workbench for producing items and gear.
Through clever management, production speeds have greatly increased.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

MedicineFacility_01.description:
A facility for making Pal medicine.
It can only produce simple medicines.
Leave its operation to a Pal that can make medicine.

MedicineFacility_02.description:
A facility for making Pal medicine.
It requires electricity, but can produce high quality medicine.
Leave its operation to a Pal that can make medicine.

StonePit.description:
A facility for producing Stone.
Mining Stone is hard work that requires much physical endurance.
Leave it to Pals skilled at mining.

CopperPit.description:
Facility for producing Ore.
Mining Ore is hard work that requires physical endurance.
Leave it to Pals skilled at mining.

CopperPit_2.description:
Facility for producing large quantities of Ore.
Mining Ore is hard work that requires physical endurance.
Leave it to Pals skilled at mining.

WeaponFactory_Dirty_01.description:
An Assembly Line for producing weapons and ammunition.
A small workspace prevents the production of high quality weapons.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

WeaponFactory_Dirty_02.description:
An Assembly Line for producing weapons and ammunition.
Dividing up work has allowed for the production of somewhat decent armaments.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

WeaponFactory_Dirty_03.description:
An Assembly Line for producing weapons and ammunition.
Cleverly dividing up work has allowed for production of top-class weapons.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

WorkBench.description:
A Primitive Workbench for producing simple items.
Requires a Pal that can work with their hands.

StationDeforest2.description:
A facility for producing Wood.
Cutting wood is hard work that requires much physical endurance.
Leave it to Pals skilled in logging.

WorkBench_SkillUnlock.description:
A Primitive Workbench for producing Pal tools.
Make a saddle to ride Pals, or make a gun for Pals to use.

Crusher.description:
Facility for breaking down Stone and Wood to exchange them for other materials.
Requires Pal with the Watering trait to spin the water turbine.

FlourMill.description:
Facility for milling Wheat to produce Flour.
Requires Pal with the Watering trait to spin the water turbine.

BreedFarm.description:
Assign one male and one female Pal to produce eggs.
Placing Cake in the facility is required for production.

RepairBench.description:
Workbench for repairing broken tools.
Materials are needed to make repairs.

ToolBoxV1.description:
Place in base to improve handiwork speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

OlympicCauldron.description:
Place in base to improve fire-making speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

Fountain.description:
Place in base to improve watering speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

FlowerBed.description:
Place in base to improve gathering speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

Silo.description:
Place in base to improve planting speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

Stump.description:
Place in base to improve logging speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

MiningTool.description:
Place in base to improve mining speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

Cauldron.description:
Place in base to improve medicine manufacturing speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

Snowman.description:
Place in base to improve cooling speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

TransmissionTower.description:
Place in base to improve electricity generating speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

BaseCampWorkHard.description:
Command your Pals to work on various things inside a base.
You can allow or prohibit individual kinds of work.

CoolerBox.description:
Small food vault.
Assign an Ice Pal to help prevent
food stored inside from spoiling.

Refrigerator.description:
Large food vault.
Assign an Ice Pal to help prevent
food stored inside from spoiling.

Signboard.description:
Can be written on.
Use for memos or to communicate with others.

WallSignboard.description:
A signboard to write on.
Can be hung on walls.

MonsterFarm.description:
Farm for raising sheep and fowl-like Pals.
Assign a Pal with the appropriate Partner Skill to a farm
to produce items.

DamagedScarecrow.description:
Training dummy shaped like a <characterName id=|Penguin|/>.
Can only be placed in wide open areas.

BaseCampBattleDirector.description:
Bell that sets the alert status for Pals on base.
Change Pal behavior to either attack invading enemies, or focus entirely on work whenever you like.

Shelf_Cask_Wood.description: Wooden barrel shelf for storing items.

Shelf_Hang01_Wood.description:
Wooden shelf for storing items.
Can be placed on a wall.

Shelf03_Stone.description:
Antique chest for storing items.
Adorned with a photo of a Pal.

Shelf04_Stone.description:
Antique side chest for storing items.
Adorned with a photo of a Pal.

Shelf01_Wall_Iron.description:
Iron wall shelf for storing items.
Can be placed on a wall.

Shelf06_Stone.description:
Antique long cabinet for storing items.
Adorned with a photo of a Pal.

Shelf07_Stone.description: Large antique cabinet for storing items.

Shelf01_Wall_Stone.description:
Antique cabinet for storing items.
Can be placed on walls.

Shelf02_Iron.description: Long iron shelf for storing items.

Shelf03_Iron.description:
Orange locker for storing items.
Decorated with Pal stickers.

Shelf04_Iron.description:
Locker for storing items.
Decorated with Pal stickers.

Container01_Iron.description:
Large container for storing items.
Imitates the designs left behind by an ancient and prosperous civilization.

Box02_Iron.description: Cloth covered container for storing items.

Shelf_Hang02_Wood.description:
Decorative wooden shelf.
Can be placed on a wall.

Ivy01.description:
Decorative large ivy.
Can be placed on a wall.

Ivy02.description:
Decorative small ivy.
Can be placed on a wall.

Ivy03.description:
Decorative horizontal ivy.
Can be placed on a wall.

TableDresser01_Stone.description:
Dresser useful for giving yourself a remake.
Allows players to edit their appearance.

Mirror01_Wall_Stone.description:
Decorative antique wall mirror.
Can be placed on walls.

Piano01_Stone.description:
Decorative grand piano.
Cannot be played.

Piano02_Stone.description:
Decorative upright piano.
Cannot be played.

Toilet01_Stone.description:
Decorative antique toilet.
Cannot be used for its original purpose.

Curtain01_Wall_Stone.description:
Decorative antique curtain.
Can be placed on walls.

Clock01_Wall_Iron.description:
Decorative wall clock.
Broken, it doesn't tell time.

Clock01_Stone.description:
Decorative antique grandfather clock.
Broken, it doesn't tell time.

GoalSoccer_Iron.description:
Decorative soccer goal.
Kicking a <characterName id=|SheepBall|/> into it will get you no points.

MachineGame01_Iron.description:
Decorative claw crane.
Broken, it can't be played.

MachineVending01_Iron.description:
Decorative cola vending machine.
Cannot be used to buy items.

Television01_Iron.description:
Decorative old TV.
Left behind by an ancient civilization,
now it only shows images of Pengullet.

SignExit_Ceiling_Iron.description:
Decorative emergency exit sign.
Can be placed on ceilings.

SignExit_Wall_Iron.description:
Decorative emergency exit sign.
Can be placed on walls.

TrafficSign01_Iron.description:
Decorative No Pals Beyond sign.
Used in ancient times, it now serves no real purpose.

TrafficSign02_Iron.description:
Decorative Stop sign.
Used in ancient times, it now serves no real purpose.

TrafficSign03_Iron.description:
Decorative Beware of Eikthyrdeer sign.
In ancient times, collisions between Eikthyrdeer and other Pals were frequent.

TrafficSign04_Iron.description:
Decorative Beware of Mammorest sign.
In ancient times, those who angered a Mammorest were often killed.

Light_FirePlace01.description:
Brick fireplace that provides illumination.
Must be lit with fire from a Fire Pal.

Light_FirePlace02.description:
Fireplace that provides illumination.
Must be lit with fire from a Fire Pal.

Light_LightPole01.description:
Simple street lamp that provides illumination.
Requires electricity to light.

Light_LightPole02.description:
Double street lamp that provides illumination.
Requires electricity to light.

Light_LightPole03.description:
Retro street lamp that provides illumination.
Requires electricity to light.

Light_LightPole04.description:
Stylish street lamp that provides illumination.
Requires electricity to light.

Light_FloorLamp01.description:
Antique brown floor lamp that provides illumination.
Requires electricity to light.

Light_FloorLamp02.description:
Antique red floor lamp that provides illumination.
Requires electricity to light.

Light_CandleSticks_Top.description:
Chandelier that provides illumination.
Requires electricity to light.

Light_CandleSticks_Wall.description:
Wall lamp that provides illumination.
Requires electricity to light.

Altar.description:
Offer a Slab depicting a Pal
to summon a powerful Pal to your base.
Adequate caution and battle readiness is paramount.

CoolerPalFoodBox.description:
A feeding box that can be kept cold.
Assign an Ice Pal to it and
the food inside will be less likely to spoil.

DismantlingConveyor.description: A dream-like facility that automatically butchers any Pal that is placed inside.

ElectricGenerator_Large.description:
A power generator fueled by Electric Pals.
Larger and with improved power generation efficiency.

OilPump.description:
Equipment required to extract Crude Oil from oil fields.
Requires a power supply to operate.

CoalPit.description:
Facility for producing Coal.
Digging Coal is grueling physical work.
Leave it to a Pal that is good at mining.

SulfurPit.description:
Facility for producing Sulfur.
Digging Sulfur is grueling physical work.
Leave it to a Pal that is good at mining.

IceCrusher.description:
Facility that crushes Ore and
converts it into other materials.
Requires a power supply and a Pal with Cooling suitability, but it's very efficient.

Glass_foundation.description:
A foundation for building walls or facilities on.
Made of industrial-strength glass, it's quite sturdy.

Glass_wall.description:
Walls built on foundations for keeping out intruders.
Made of industrial-strength glass, it's quite sturdy.

Glass_WindowWall.description:
Wall with windows, built on foundations for keeping out intruders.
Made of industrial-strength glass, it's quite sturdy.

Glass_TriangleWall.description:
Triangular wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders.
Made of industrial-strength glass, it's quite sturdy.

Glass_roof.description:
A roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind.
Made of industrial-strength glass, it's quite sturdy.

Glass_SlantedRoof.description:
Slanted roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind.
Made of industrial-strength glass, it's quite sturdy.

Glass_stair.description:
Stairs placed below a foundation or roof for climbing up.
Made of industrial-strength glass, it's quite sturdy.

Glass_DoorWall.description:
Door built on a foundation. Becomes an entrance.
Made of industrial-strength glass, it's quite sturdy.

SkinChange.description:
Pal Dressing Facility.
Give your Pals a new look!
Skins obtained inside and outside the game can be applied here!
